scripts.test:ui: npm run test:electron && npm run test:browser && npm run test:openfin
scripts.test:electron: rimraf src && copyfiles -f "demo/**" src && cross-env MOCHA_CONTAINER=electron mocha test/*.js
scripts.test:openfin: npm run clean:cache && rimraf src && copyfiles -f "demo/**" src && copyfiles -f "node_modules/containerjs-api-bundle/build/**" src && cross-env MOCHA_CONTAINER=openfin mocha test/*.js
scripts.test:browser: rimraf src && copyfiles -f "demo/**" src && copyfiles -f "node_modules/containerjs-api-bundle/build/**" src && cross-env MOCHA_CONTAINER=browser mocha test/*.js
